name: Sokoban: Thayus Edition
description:
This game is in very early alpha. Bugs will be very common.

This, is my first "real" game! Sokoban is a classic Japanese puzzle game from back in the day. I decided to have a go at recreating it!

As is said above, this game is in very early alpha. This means that not all features are developed, and you will find lots of bugs. Please report them below!

I'm hyped for the development of this and I hope that you all enjoy it as I develop it. I will be regularly updating this page with the latest features, possibly accompanied with a devlog.

Have fun!
